details.title: NGSI Type browser
details.description: Browse the available entity types of a given Orio context broker server

preference.name: ngsi_server
preference.label: NGSI server URL
preference.description: URL of the Orion Context Broker to use for retrieving entity information

preference.name: use_user_fiware_token
preference.label: Use the FIWARE credentials of the user
preference.description: Use the FIWARE credentials of the user logged into WireCloud. Take into account this option cannot be enabled if you want to use this widget in a public workspace as anonoymous users doesn't have a valid FIWARE auth token

preference.name: use_owner_credentials
preference.label: Use the FIWARE credentials of the workspace owner
preference.description: Use the FIWARE credentials of the owner of the workspace. This preference takes preference over "Use the FIWARE credentials of the user". This feature is available on WireCloud 0.7.0+ in a experimental basis, future versions of WireCloud can change the way to use it making this option not funcional and requiring you to upgrade this operator

preference.name: ngsi_tenant
preference.label: NGSI tenant/service
preference.description: Tenant/service to use when connecting to the context broker. Must be a string of alphanumeric characters (lowercase) and the "_" symbol. Maximum length is 50 characters. If empty, the default tenant will be used

preference.name: ngsi_service_path
preference.label: NGSI scope
preference.description: Scope/path to use when connecting to the context broker. Must be a string of alphanumeric characters (lowercase) and the "_" symbol separated by "/" slashes. Maximum length is 50 characters. If empty, the default service path will be used: /

preference.name: allow_map
preference.label: Display a Show in a map button
preference.description: Allow users to display entities in a map
